atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure to install the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer on the other side.

s2.ptxt: Align the keyway of the ultrasonic sensor retainer and the protrusion of the rear bumper cover, as shown in the illustration.
Attach the 2 claws to install the ultrasonic sensor retainer to the rear bumper cover.

item.ptxt: Do not damage the rear bumper cover with the protrusion of the ultrasonic sensor retainer when installing the retainer.
Firmly push in the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer so that there is no gap between the retainer and the surface of the rear bumper cover.
If there is a gap between the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer and the rear bumper cover surface, push in the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer. Do not push the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor.

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure to install the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor on the other side.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 claws to install the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor.

atten3.ptxt: If there is a gap between the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer and the rear bumper cover surface, push in the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor retainer. Do not push the No. 1 ultrasonic sensor.

s2.ptxt: Install the rear bumper cover (See page ).
